exercises.name: low lunge
exercises.prepposestoopen: adho mukha svanasana, urdhva mukha svanasana, apanasana, bhujangasana, bidalasana, urdhva hastasana, utkatasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, ardha uttanasana, bhujangasana, bidalasana, phalakasana, salabhasana A, salabhasana B, salabhasana C, utkatasana, anahatasana, uttanasana
exercises.preparesfor: ashta chandrasana, eka pada adho mukha vrksasana, hanumanasana, supta virasana, virabhadrasana I, virabhadrasana II, virasana

exercises.name: half standing forward fold
exercises.prepposestoopen: bhujangasana, bidalasana, dandasana, tadasana, supta padangusthasana, uttanasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, bidalasana, utkatasana, uttanasana

exercises.name: thread the needle
exercises.counterposes: malasana, garudasana, supta baddha konasana, balasana

exercises.name: downward facing dog
exercises.prepposestoopen: ardha uttanasana, bidalasana, uttanasana, anahatasana, urdhva hastasana arms, gomukhasana arms, garudasana arms
exercises.prepposestostabilize: anjaneyasana, bidalasana, phalakasana, shishulasana, tadasana, uttanasana
exercises.preparesfor: bakasana, adho mukha vrksasana, salamba sirsasanaI, salamba sirsasana II; uttanasana
exercises.counterposes: balasana, apanasana, supta parivartanasana, viparita karani, savasana

exercises.name: puppy pose
exercises.prepposestoopen: adho mukha svanasana, anjaneyasana, ardha uttanasana, ashta chandrasana, balasana, bidalasana, garudasana, gomukhasana, urdhva hastasana, utkatasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, anjaneyasana, ardha uttanasana, ashta chandrasana, balasana, bidalasana, shishulasana, utkatasana, malasana, parsvottanasana
exercises.preparesfor: adho mukha svanasana, adho mukha vrksasana, urdhva dhanurasana, gomukhasana arms

exercises.name: crescent
exercises.prepposestoopen: adho mukha svanasana, anjaneyasana, bidalasana, utkatasana, uttana prasithasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, urdhva mukha svanasana, anjaneyasana, bidalasana, bhujangasana, garudasana, prasarita padottanasana, tadasana, urdhva hastasana, utkatasana, uttanasana, utthita trikonasana, virabhadrasana II
exercises.preparesfor: virabhadrasana I, virabhadrasana II, parivrtta ashta chandrasana, parivrtta parsvakonasana, virabhadrasana III, parivritta ardha chandrasana, adho mukha vrksasana, parsvakonasana

exercises.name: warrior two
exercises.prepposestoopen: anjaneyasana, ashta chandrasana, baddha konasana, supta padangusthasana, tadasana, utthita trikonasana, vrksasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, anjaneyasana, ardha uttanasana, ashta chandrasana, bidalasana, prasarita padottanasana D, tadasana, vasisthasana
exercises.preparesfor: reverse warrior, utthita parsvakonasana, utthita trikonasana, ardha chandrasana, svarga dvijasana, dancing warrior
exercises.counterposes: vinyasa, urdhva mukha svanasana, adho mukha svanasana, gomukhasana, paschimottanasana, balasana

exercises.name: sitting forward fold
exercises.prepposestoopen: adho mukha svanasana, blasana, dandasana, janu sirsasana, supta padangusthasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, agnistambhasana, ardha uttanasana, balasana, dandasana, halasana, karnapidasana, pada hastasana, padangusthasana, parsvottanasana, prasarita padottanasana D, supta padangusthasana, upavista konasana, uttanasana
exercises.preparesfor: transition to halasana, salamba sarvangasana, karnapidasana, upavista konasana, tiriang mukha eka pada paschimottanasana, krounchasana, kurmasana, ubhaya padangusthasana, urdhva mukha paschimottanasana
exercises.counterposes: supine twist, supta baddha konasana, apanasana, savasana

exercises.name: staff pose
exercises.prepposestoopen: adho mukha svanasana, ardha uttanasana, supta padangusthasana, uttanasana
exercises.prepposestostabilize: adho mukha svanasana, ardha uttanasana, supta padangusthasana, uttanasana
exercises.counterposes: apanasana, baddha konasana, supta baddha konasana, viparita karani, savasana
